parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Event Handlers
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Event Handlers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Remove a given event handler from the given display.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> display '''displayRemoveEventHandler''' [handler name,id]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> display: [[Display]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [handler name,id]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> Nothing

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[findDisplay]] 46 [[displayRemoveEventHandler]] ["keyDown",5];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[disableSerialization]], [[Display]], [[displayAddEventHandler]], [[displayRemoveAllEventHandlers]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 19, 2015 - 21:25 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:IT07|IT07]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
If you for example used this code to add the eventHandler:
<code>_myEH = [[findDisplay]] 46 [[displayAddEventHandler]] ["KeyDown", "[[hint]] [[str]] [[Magic Variables#this|_this]]"];</code>
Then this would be the correct code to remove that eventHandler again:
<code>[[findDisplay]] 46 [[displayRemoveEventHandler]] ["KeyDown", _myEH];</code>
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
